result.eng: Is there an elevator in this building?

result.orig: an bhfuil ardaitheoir san fhoirgneamh seo
result.html: an bhfuil ardaitheoir san fhoirgneamh seoIs there an elevator in this building?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil ardaiṫeoir san ḟoirgneaṁ seoIs there an elevator in this building?

result.eng: They pulled down the tallest building.
result.ga: leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.orig: leag siad an foirgneamh is airde
result.html: leag siad an foirgneamh is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.
result.ponchtml: leag siad an foirgneaṁ is airdeThey pulled down the tallest building.

result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ga: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.orig: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.html: b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamhI'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟearr liom fanaċt taoḃ istiġ den ḟoirgneaṁI'd rather stay inside the building.

result.html: díolann an comhlacht ábhar tógálaThe company sells building materials.
result.ponchtml: díolann an coṁlaċt áḃar tógálaThe company sells building materials.

result.html: foirgneamh aon stóirSingle-storey building.
result.ponchtml: foirgneaṁ aon stóirSingle-storey building.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.orig: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhrac
result.html: bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i nua-eabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i nua-eaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: "Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ga: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.orig: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas
result.html: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a chuaigh róchóngarach don fhoirgneamh a shíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.
result.ponchtml: amadán éigin ag eitilt turasóirí timpeall manhattan agus a ċuaiġ róċóngaraċ don ḟoirgneaṁ a ẛíleas"Some fool was flying tourists around Manhattan and went to close to the building", I thought.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ga: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádála
result.orig: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádála
result.html: dhá nóiméad tar éis a naoi phléasc dara foirgneamh an lárionad trádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
result.ponchtml: ḋá nóiméad tar éis a naoi ṗléasc dara foirgneaṁ an lárionad trádálaTwo minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ga: go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.orig: go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.html: go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seachtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid
